question.title: Buildings With an Ocean View
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Number of Visible People in a Queue", "titleSlug": "number-of-visible-people-in-a-queue", "difficulty": "Hard", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Finding the Number of Visible Mountains", "titleSlug": "finding-the-number-of-visible-mountains", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: You can traverse the buildings from the nearest to the ocean to the furthest.
Keep with you the maximum to the right while traversing to determine if you can see the ocean or not.
